podcast_summary: Archive of Ed German's The Urban Jazz Experience, heard live on WLIW-FM Monday through Thursday 8pm - 11pm. Ask your smart speaker to play WLIW-FM, tune in at 88.3 FM, 88.7 FM, and 96.9 FM, or stream at wliw.org/radio and the WLIW-FM app.
podcast_highlights: 1. Archive of Ed German's The Urban Jazz Experience, heard live on WLIW-FM Monday through Thursday 8pm - 11pm. Ask your smart speaker to play WLIW-FM, tune in at 88.3 FM, 88.7 FM, and 96.9 FM, or stream at wliw.org/radio and the WLIW-FM app.
